Always clean hands by rubbing them with an alcohol disinfectant or washing them thoroughly with soap and water. 

When coughing and sneezing, be sure to cover your mouth and nose with your folded elbow or tissue, and dispose of the tissue immediately and wash your hands. 

Avoid approaching people with fever and cough, and keep a distance of at least one meter (3 feet). 

If you have a fever, cough, and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early. 

To conduct Corona analyzes, call us now on 01094975895

Have you ever known the importance of analyzing a Complete Blood Picture? It is one of the most important tests that easily detect blood diseases and other diseases that affect the functions of the body.

One of the most difficult types of allergy is the "sensitivity of inhalants," especially in the periods of dust and coolness and months of study for students Allergic infertility causes the symptoms of allergy, eye and nose and chest infections such as pollen, cats, birds, and dust mites, which causes the person to get hurt and enter into a long and painful illness. 

Some people may not know what is the cause of allergies, what kind of allergies and how long they are there. 

Al Hayah Laboratory offers this test for 30 different types of fungi, inhalants, dust, perfumes and paints

Despite being high in fat, nuts are incredibly nutritious and healthy. 

They are loaded with magnesium, vitamin E, fiber and various other nutrients (9). 

Studies show that nuts can help you lose weight, and may help fight type 2 diabetes and heart disease (10, 11, 12). 

Additionally, about 10–15% of the calories in nuts aren't even absorbed into the body, and some evidence suggests that they can boost metabolism (13). 

In one study, almonds were shown to increase weight loss by 62\% compared to complex carbohydrates (14).

Sugary drinks are the most fattening things you can put into your body. 

This is because liquid sugar calories don't get registered by the brain in the same way as calories from solid foods (1). 

For this reason, when you drink soda, you end up eating more total calories (2, 3). 

Sugary drinks are strongly associated with obesity, type 2 diabetes, heart disease and all sorts of health problems (4, 5, 6, 7). 

Keep in mind that fruit juices are almost as bad as soda in this regard. 

They contain just as much sugar, and the small amounts of antioxidants do NOT negate the harmful effects of the sugar (8).

All the processed junk foods in the diet are the biggest reason the world is fatter and sicker than ever before. 

These foods have been engineered to be "hyper-rewarding," so they trick our brains into eating more than we need, even leading to addiction in some people (15). 

They are also low in fiber, protein and micronutrients (empty calories), but high in unhealthy ingredients like added sugar and refined grains.

Coffee has been unfairly demonized. 

The truth is that it's actually very healthy. 

Coffee is high in antioxidants, and studies show that coffee drinkers live longer, and have a reduced risk of type 2 diabetes, Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's and numerous other diseases (16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21).

Pretty much everyone agrees that fish is healthy. 

This is particularly true of fatty fish, like salmon, which is loaded with omega-3 fatty acids and various other nutrients (22). 

Studies show that people who eat the most fish have a lower risk of all sorts of diseases, including heart disease, dementia and depression (23, 24, 25).

The importance of getting enough quality sleep can not be overstated. 

It may be just as important as diet and exercise, if not more. 

Poor sleep can drive insulin resistance, throw your appetite hormones out of whack and reduce your physical and mental performance (26, 27, 28, 29). 

What's more, it is one of the strongest individual risk factors for future weight gain and obesity. 

One study showed that short sleep was linked to 89% increased risk of obesity in children, and 55% in adults (30).
In the case of tests requiring patient fasting, water can be drunk at any time.\nWe provide sampling services, so we can collect samples from homes, offices or hospitals.

Wash the hand and genitalia with soap and water and disinfect the urinary incontinence.
Then wash again with water to remove the excess disinfectant.
The first part of the urine is then emptied into the toilet and the rest is collected in the sterile container provided by the laboratory.
In order to give the microbe a chance to grow and preferably the incubation period of urine within the bladder from 2 hours to 6 hours, (in case of sending the sample from home should reach the laboratory within two hours at the most so as not to die microbial or increase the count Bkitri.

The patient empties the entire bladder into the toilet and records the time then - collects urine afterwards in a suitable clean, dry and adequate bottle for the assembly.\nThe urine is kept collected at the same time as the beginning of the assembly from the next day and the urine is kept in the refrigerator until it is sent to The lab.
This analysis works to detect the TB microbial in 3 samples because the microbe can be shown in a sample and not shown in another sample
Fasting is required for 12–14 hours to complete the absorption of fat in the blood and its stability
Fasting is required from 6–8 hours in order to complete the burning of sugar and taking the ratio

Please start counting two hours of your meal and taking any medication if you need to, taking care to finish eating within 10 minutes at most (and not taking anything until you have your blood sample).\nPlease come to the lab 15 minutes before the analysis.

Please collect the first spit in the morning after gurgling with water several times before eating, and we will not accept saliva samples.\nSamples must be delivered separately on the same day.\nYou may wish to use hot water vapor inhalation in the morning to facilitate sample collection.

Preferably the first urine in the morning where the hormone pregnancy is more concentrated - with the reduction of fluid intake the evening before the analysis - so as not to hide the concentration of the hormone if the result is negative we suggest a pregnancy test by blood because this test is more sensitive.

It is necessary to abstain from intercourse or to have a period of 3–5 days in a row so as not to be affected by the quantity.\nIt is preferable to give the sample in the laboratory with attention to placing the first points of semen because these points have Three-quarters sperm count.\nIf the sample is brought from the house, More than 20 minutes
The urine is kept for an hour before the test until the urethra is completely dry to make sure that the microbe is present from the penis and not from the urine.
This sample has an earlier date and requires no intercourse for two days until we make sure that the microbe took its chance to grow with the antibiotic abstain for 48 hours

The patient will abstain 10 days prior to performing the analysis on the introduction of a laparoscope or catheter or an anal examination of the prostate because this will affect the outcome of the analysis only if there is another opinion of the treating physician

The sample is required to arrive at the laboratory within two hours at the most because there are some microbes that die quickly and do not accept samples in Pampers or cartons because they absorb fluid from the sample and drought kill the microbes and prefer to refrain from antibiotic for 48 hours.

Collect a 24-hour urine sample (as described above) in a special bottle provided by the laboratory.\nDuring the previous 48 hours, avoid eating or swallowing any tea, coffee, biscuits, vanilla, plum, avocado, pineapple, eggplant, tomatoes or bananas.

The drug is taken for 5 days regularly, with the aim of reaching a fixed level of blood and requiring no vomiting or diarrhea for 48 hours prior to the analysis because this will affect the dose and thus the level of the drug in blood.\nA sample is taken before any dose to calculate the proportion of the drug at the lowest level (Trough) After taking the medicine 2 hours (different from one drug to another) to calculate the highest percentage of blood in the blood (Peak) so that we make sure that the dose without access to drug poisoning

The drug is taken for 5 days regularly, with the aim of reaching a fixed level of blood and requiring no vomiting or diarrhea for 48 hours prior to the analysis because this will affect the dose and thus the level of the drug in blood.\nA sample is taken before any dose to calculate the proportion of the drug at the lowest level (Trough) After taking the medicine 2 hours (different from one drug to another) to calculate the highest percentage of blood in the blood (Peak) so that we make sure that the dose without access to drug poisoning

Analysis is by reservation only.\nThe patient should refrain from urinating for a while before undergoing analysis, and it is advisable not to take any antibiotics during the 48 hours prior to the analysis.
We are a medical team that strives to make a small but positive contribution to a better future and works to build a better, stronger and healthier society by improving access to quality service.

To be the best in providing the service in the shortest possible time at the appropriate cost without high cost or exploitation, and we seek to achieve the vision through:\nThe full commitment of the work team to provide the service to the fullest\nand the use of new and advanced technology.
To always be next to every person who needs service and provide him with high quality laboratory diagnostic information in the least possible time and at the most appropriate prices.

The lab has a distinguished medical team working in a team spirit.
The lab provides a hormone and tumor marker.
The lab provides the latest device in the work of cumulative sugar.
The lab provides a (CASA) device for computerized semen analysis.
The lab is unique in applying the barcode system in recording samples to prevent possibilities Human error in entering samples into devices.
The lab operates 24 hours a day, taking into account emergencies.
The lab provides a sample collection service from homes and clinics.
The lab provides subscription programs at various discounted prices that suit everyone.
The lab welcomes all contracts with institutions The laboratory provides a self-sampling system (vaccum) to prevent the possibility of samples contamination.
The laboratory has a distinguished medical team in withdrawing samples for newborns.
Clients contracted with Al Hayah Laboratory

1- The National Bank of Egypt.
2- Tasahil Association for Loans.
3- Bar Association.
4- Water and Sanitation Company.
5- Al-Rahi Office for Development.
6- Al-Mahaba Coptic Orthodox Association.
7- Al-Rouad Association for Community Development in Al-Khattarah .
8- Al-Bir Society for Community Development in Al-Khattarah.
9- Women’s Association for Community Development in Hajer Danfiq.
10- Al-Nada Association for Community Development in Hajer Danfik.
11- Happy Heart Center for Special Needs.
12- Pension and Social Security Syndicate.

Al-Hayat lab pays attention to the public health of its customers, we encourage them to periodically and continuously reassure their health by doing periodic examinations, which will:

identify people who are exposed to certain diseases such as diabetes and other diseases.
Early detection of the disease before its symptoms appear.
 
The following tests and totals of analyzes were selected based on the recommendations of the World Health Organization and other global scientific recommendations, such as the American and European scientific societies.
